decks.notes: The main idea of this deck is to utilize the partner commanders Thrasios, Triton Hero and Tymna the Weaver to create a fast and aggressive strategy. The deck contains a mix of efficient creatures, mana dorks, and disruptive spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly building up a board presence. By utilizing cards like Birthing Pod and Aluren, the deck can quickly assemble powerful combinations of creatures to overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of tutors like Demonic Tutor and Enlightened Tutor allows for consistency in finding crucial pieces. The deck aims to apply pressure early on and maintain a steady stream of threats to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on aggressive, fast-paced gameplay utilizing burn spells and efficient creatures along with a consistent mana base to quickly deal damage to the opponent. With Kari Zev, Skyship Raider as the commander, the strategy is to swarm the board with low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Goblin Guide, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Blood Moon and Robber of the Rich. The deck capitalizes on direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Searing Blaze to finish off the opponent before they can stabilize. The goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game as quickly as possible through a combination of creature combat and burn spells.

The key concept of this deck is to control the game through card advantage and countering the opponent's spells. The deck focuses on using counterspells like Force of Will, Counterspell, and Spell Snare to disrupt the opponent's plays and maintain control of the game. It includes powerful cards like Vendilion Clique, Jace, the Mind Sculptor, and Teferi, Temporal Archmage to generate card advantage and manipulate the opponent's hand and board state. The deck also has a strong focus on time manipulation, utilizing spells like Time Warp, Temporal Mastery, and Walk the Aeons to take extra turns and gain further advantage. Additionally, it includes win conditions like Emrakul, the Promised End and True-Name Nemesis to close out the game.

The deck revolves around utilizing graveyard recursion, sacrificing creatures for value, and applying pressure on the opponent early in the game. Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis serves as the commander and key win condition, able to be cast for a reduced cost thanks to the deck's emphasis on filling the graveyard with creatures. Cards like Bloodghast, Vengevine, and Greater Good help to fuel the graveyard strategy, while efficient removal like Fatal Push and Assassin's Trophy provide answers to opposing threats. The deck aims to quickly establish a board presence, disrupt the opponent's game plan with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, and overwhelm them with a relentless stream of aggressive creatures.

This deck focuses on utilizing Niv-Mizzet Reborn's ability to draw cards and gain card advantage by including a wide variety of different colored cards. The deck aims to control the game by disrupting opponents' strategies with a suite of counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures. By having a high density of multicolored cards, the deck can consistently trigger Niv-Mizzet Reborn's ability to draw two cards, allowing the player to dig deeper into their deck and find the answers they need to maintain board control. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Ral, Izzet Viceroy to generate additional value and close out games.

This deck revolves around utilizing Niv-Mizzet Reborn as the commander to gain card advantage and control the game. The deck includes a variety of multicolored spells to ensure value from Niv-Mizzet's ability, allowing the player to consistently draw cards and answer threats. With a mix of removal, card draw, counter spells, and versatile threats, the deck aims to disrupt opponents while building up its own resources. By efficiently managing resources and utilizing Niv-Mizzet's ability to its fullest potential, this control deck can outvalue opponents and grind out wins through card advantage and powerful spells.

This deck focuses on utilizing a wide variety of control spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect your own game plan. With Niv-Mizzet Reborn as the commander, the deck aims to have a diverse range of spells in order to maximize the potential of Niv-Mizzet's ability to draw cards and create card advantage. The deck contains a mix of removal, counterspells, card draw, and versatile spells to handle different threats and situations. By carefully managing resources and making strategic decisions, the deck aims to outmaneuver the opponent and ultimately establish control over the game while setting up win conditions through Niv-Mizzet's card advantage and powerful spells.

The deck is centered around Saskia the Unyielding as the commander, focusing on an aggressive playstyle to overwhelm opponents quickly. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures, removal spells, and powerful enchantments to maintain pressure on the opponent. With a diverse mana base and a variety of powerful cards like Berserk, Demonic Tutor, and Boros Charm, the deck aims to consistently apply pressure and control the board while dealing damage efficiently. Saskia's ability to deal additional damage to opponents makes her a formidable commander in an aggressive strategy, and the deck is designed to maximize her potential to close out games quickly.
